name: Popstar Crush—funny game
description:
Game Description: A global players love classic elimination games.

Game Features:Simple and easy of cure game,concise and comfortable of visual enjoyment,bring to you the most pleasant game experience.What are you waiting for,with friends to crush the stars together!

Playing Method:Players need to be the same color of the square stars together to eliminate,just click on two or more than two squares of the same colour can be eliminate,no time limit,each phase has a goal,finish to get to the next level.
